title: 10 Natural soap bags
subTitle: The eco-friendly accessory to store and use your soap.

marketingArguments.title: Sustainable & Biodegradable
marketingArguments.speech: Made of natural plant fibers, durable for a long time to use.

marketingArguments.title: Easy to use and to extend your soap
marketingArguments.speech: Put the soap into the bag and use them like this. Let both the soap and the bag, dry together every time.

marketingArguments.title: Stimulates blood circulation
marketingArguments.speech: You can use it with soap, shower gel and cleansing lotion. By gently massaging your skin it will stimulate your blood circulation during your shower.

marketingArguments.title: Tighten design
marketingArguments.speech: Adapts to the size of your soap, just pull the string to tighten it. Easy use again and again.
